--- title: "Test Visualization: Theme and SEO Compatibility" description: "A test visualization to verify SEO enhancements and theme compatibility, featuring both light and dark mode support." subtitle: "Testing SEO improvements with theme compatibility" author: "Steven Ponce" date: "2024-02-14" date-modified: "2024-02-14" # SEO and Social Sharing image: "thumbnails/test_viz.png" image-alt: "A test visualization showing theme compatibility and SEO improvements" # Categories and Tags categories: - "Test" - "Data Visualization" - "R Programming" keywords: - test visualization - theme compatibility - SEO optimization - R programming # Page Settings format: html: theme: light: [flatly, assets/styling/custom_styles.scss] dark: [darkly, assets/styling/custom_styles_dark.scss] toc: true code-fold: true code-tools: true code-summary: "Show code" self-contained: true include-in-header: - text: | canonical-href: "https://stevenponce.netlify.app/test-viz.html" # Social Sharing share: permalink: "https://stevenponce.netlify.app/test-viz.html" description: "Testing SEO improvements and theme compatibility" twitter: true linkedin: true email: true editor_options: chunk_output_type: console execute: error: false message: false warning: false eval: true --- ```{=html}
``` ## Test Visualization Let's create a simple visualization to test both theme compatibility and SEO elements: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) # Create sample data set.seed(123) test_data <- tibble( x = 1:50, y = cumsum(rnorm(50)) ) # Create plot ggplot(test_data, aes(x, y)) + geom_line(color = "#0072B2") + geom_point(color = "#D55E00") + theme_minimal() + labs( title = "Test Visualization", subtitle = "Sample data with light/dark theme compatibility", x = "Time Point", y = "Cumulative Value" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](seo-test_files/figure-html/test-plot-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: ## Testing Different Elements ### Code Block ```r # This is a code block to test syntax highlighting function_test <- function(x) { result <- x^2 return(result) } ``` ### Callout Boxes ::: {.callout-note} This is a note callout to test theme compatibility ::: ::: {.callout-tip} This is a tip callout with theme support ::: ### Table Test | Column A | Column B | Column C | |----------|----------|----------| | Value 1 | Value 2 | Value 3 | | Value 4 | Value 5 | Value 6 |
